review_blob:
About as bland a pale ale you can find. No character. Very little hop aroma. No body. Bland. Bland. Bland. 

- Rated with Beer Rater for Windows Phone
beer_name: Goose Island Green Line Pale Ale

review_blob: Everything about this porter is spot in for the style. The smoky flavor doesn't hit you when you first drink it but the aftertaste leaves a burning sensation in your throat. You know you just inhaled smoke.
First taste very nice. Carmel color and finish with nice hop balance. Spice balance.
A very good example io the style. Great color. Head retention throughout is excellent.
A nice easy drinking saison. Crisp with just the right amount of aftertaste for the style.
